creator: G5 Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
The BEST crime-solving game is calling players for duty! Are you ready to prove your detective skills and step into a riveting world of danger, betrayal … and murder? Homicide Squad is a heart-pounding hidden object and match-3 game filled with exhilarating gameplay and perplexing murder mysteries!

Download this captivating crime game now and embark on a highly interactive hidden object journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes, from a bloody fountain, to a man frozen in a barrel of water. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Do you have what it takes to find important objects and solve baffling crimes? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides have been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. To bring the perpetrators to justice and reinstate peace of mind for residents, you’ll have to:

CHOOSE your favourite gameplay mode for any scene
FIND hidden objects and use them or
MATCH gems in a row,
INTERROGATE cagey suspects,
ANALYSE strange clues, and
SOLVE mind-blowing crimes!

Plus, more criminal cases, locations, characters, quests and levels are coming in regular updates that are absolutely FREE!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
______________________________

Compatibility notes: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

🚖TRAFFIC JAM EVENT – Complete 32 quests and six collections to earn the Traffic Jam Medal, avatars and a special decoration: a Zeppelin, offering $500 in cash and one Magnifying Glass every 24 hours for three months!
👍FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS – Enjoy key optimisations!

💐DEATH DO US PART EVENT– Complete 32 quests and six collections to earn the Bridal Bouquet Medal, avatars and a special decoration: a Couple of Swans, which offers 30 Energy points and a Reducing Agent every 24 hours for three months!

🎉SHENG'S BIRTHDAY EVENT – Tackle 32 quests and 6 collections to get the Santa of the Year Medal and a Christmas Airship decoration, which offers a Police Pass and multi-reagent every 24 hours for 3 months!
🚨NEW MINI-GAME – Stop a dangerous road situation, arrest the perps and earn a Reward for Hard Work!

title: Homicide Squad: New York Cases

creator: G5 Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
The BEST crime-solving game is calling players for duty! Are you ready to prove your detective skills and step into a riveting world of danger, betrayal … and murder? Homicide Squad is a heart-pounding hidden object and match-3 game filled with exhilarating gameplay and perplexing murder mysteries!

Download this captivating crime game now and embark on a highly interactive hidden object journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes, from a bloody fountain, to a man frozen in a barrel of water. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Do you have what it takes to find important objects and solve baffling crimes? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides have been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. To bring the perpetrators to justice and reinstate peace of mind for residents, you’ll have to:

CHOOSE your favourite gameplay mode for any scene
FIND hidden objects and use them or
MATCH gems in a row,
INTERROGATE cagey suspects,
ANALYSE strange clues, and
SOLVE mind-blowing crimes!

Plus, more criminal cases, locations, characters, quests and levels are coming in regular updates that are absolutely FREE!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
______________________________

Compatibility notes: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

descriptionShort: Search for clues, find hidden objects or match gems, and solve Christmas cases!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
🚔NEW CASES – Lamonte gets a “Jane Doe” cold case, while Turino must find an escaped serial killer. Are these cases related, and can the former partners make up? Tackle 64 new quests to find out!
🔎NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – A famous actor died on a movie set. Was it a tragic accident… or not?
📽️“LIGHTS, CAMERA, ACTION!” EVENT – Master 32 quests to get the Lights, Camera, Action Medal and the Sensational Premiere decoration, offering a Flashlight and Spinner every 24 hours for three months!

title: Homicide Squad: Hidden object & Criminal case game

creator: G5 Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
The BEST crime-solving game is calling players for duty! Are you ready to prove your detective skills and step into a riveting world of danger, betrayal … and murder? Homicide Squad is a heart-pounding hidden object and match-3 game filled with exhilarating gameplay and perplexing murder mysteries!

Download this captivating crime game now and embark on a highly interactive hidden object journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes, from a bloody fountain, to a man frozen in a barrel of water. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Do you have what it takes to find important objects and solve baffling crimes? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides have been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. To bring the perpetrators to justice and reinstate peace of mind for residents, you’ll have to:

CHOOSE your favourite gameplay mode for any scene
FIND hidden objects and use them or
MATCH gems in a row,
INTERROGATE cagey suspects,
ANALYSE strange clues, and
SOLVE mind-blowing crimes!

Plus, more criminal cases, locations, characters, quests and levels are coming in regular updates that are absolutely FREE!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

title: Homicide Squad: Hidden object & Criminal case game

creator: G5 Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
Do you like interesting puzzles & brainteasers or games with crime-solving?
Homicide Squad is a hidden object puzzle and match-3 puzzle game filled with rousing gameplay and perplexing murder mysteries!

The BEST crime-solving hidden object game is calling players for duty! Are you ready to solve all the puzzles and to solve all the mysterious crimes in the big city? If yes - prove your detective skills and step into a riveting world of danger, betrayal … and murder. Unsolved hidden mysteries already waiting for you.

Try this crime game with many brainteasers now and embark on a highly interactive journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. Just like any investigation games mean interesting gameplay where you have to feel like a detective, Homicide Squad throws you into the thick of things with crime scene investigations. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Investigate the crime scenes and find clues. Do you have what it takes to search and find evidence to solve a baffling crime? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides has been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. Even the best crime investigation games are not as captivating as the stories Homicide Squad, based on real events! To bring the perpetrators to justice and reinstate peace of mind for residents, you’ll have to:

CHOOSE your favorite gameplay mode for any scene
FIND EVIDENCE and hidden clues and use them or
MATCH GEMS in a row to solve a puzzle,
ANALYZE strange clues, and
SOLVE mind-blowing mystery crimes!

Plus, more criminal cases, locations, characters, quests, and levels are coming in regular updates that are absolutely FREE!
If you like crime-solving games without wi-fi or other internet connection, then Homicide Squad - it's the right choice!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
______________________________

Compatibility notes: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.

title: Homicide Squad: Hidden Crimes

creator: G5 Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
Do you like interesting puzzle games with finding hidden objects? Try that puzzle game!

Is that hidden object puzzle game with crimes mysteries is calling players for duty! Are you ready to solve all riddles and puzzles to prove your detective skills and step into a world of danger, betrayal … and crime? That game is a heart-pounding hidden object and match-3 game filled with different game modes and adventures with murder mysteries!

If you like detective games with adventures and criminal cases, this is the hidden object game for you! Download this captivating crime game now and embark on a highly interactive hidden object journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. Investigating criminal cases will not be a relaxing game, as you have to be on your guard and think about every move you make, detective. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes, from a bloody fountain to a man frozen in a barrel of water. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Do you have what it takes to find important objects and solve baffling crimes? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides has been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. To bring the criminals to justice and reinstate peace of mind for residents, you’ll have to:

CHOOSE your favorite gameplay mode for any scene,
SEARCH for clues,
FIND secret hidden objects and use them or
MATCH gems in a row in puzzle mode,
INTERROGATE cagey suspects,
ANALYSE strange clues,
FOLLOW the adventure story,
SOLVE mystery crimes, and
FIND OUT who the killer is!

FEATURES:
— Many puzzle gameplay modes. You can solve match-3 riddles or search for hidden objects, or enjoy — spotting the differences;
— Interesting puzzle adventure with captivating quests;
— Simple and easy controls;
— It's a relaxing game;
— It's an offline game and you can play without an internet connection.

Plus, more criminal cases, locations, characters, quests and levels are coming in regular updates that are absolutely FREE!
Download "Homicide Squad: Crime Cases of a New York Detective" if you looking for unsolved secrets, mystery crime cases, or just relaxing puzzle games!

While this game is absolutely free to play, and is an absolutely wifi-free game, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

descriptionHtml:
Do you like interesting puzzles and brainteasers, or games with crime-solving?
Homicide Squad is one of the most fun puzzle games with hidden object puzzles and match-3 riddles, filled with adventure and a murder investigation! Can you solve the murder in the mystery manor, and do a matching of the clues into a coherent picture? Find clues and narrow down the suspects to put the criminals responsible in jail!

The crime-solving hidden object game is calling for duty! Are you ready to solve all the puzzles for adults and make sense of all the mysterious crimes in the big city? If so, prove your detective skills and step into a riveting world of danger, betrayal … and murder. Unsolved hidden mysteries are already waiting for you. If you like adventure games and murder investigations, Homicide Squad will give you the suspenseful atmosphere of detective games!

Try out this crime game with many brainteasers now and embark on a highly interactive journey. Play alongside the wisecracking Detectives Turino and Lamonte as they purge New York City of criminals and restore law and order. In this addictive investigation game, you’ll find absorbing gameplay where you have to think like a detective. Homicide Squad throws you into the thick of the adventure with in-depth crime scene investigations. As cases stack up on your desk, you’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes. Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate haunting cases, interact with intriguing characters and catch twisted killers. Investigate the crime scenes and find clues. Do you have what it takes to search and find clues and solve a baffling crime? There’s only one way to find out! Grab your magnifying glass and put on your detective’s hat because this is one criminal thrill ride you won’t want to miss!

A string of horrifying homicides has been reported across the city in this gripping murder mystery game. Even the best crime investigation games are not as captivating as the stories in Homicide Squad, which are based on real events!
